content: this quick and easy crochet dishcloth uses aran weight cotton yarn and a 4 mm g crochet hook the finished square measures 9 x 9 and features simple stitches double_crochet front post double_crochet and half_double_crochet for a soft ridged texture a simple edging finishes it off great as a reusable washcloth or handmade gift elevate your kitchen decor with this practical and stylish dishcloth **unique features-** easy-to-follow crochet pattern for beginners includes photo tutorial and written instructions made with high-quality paintbox yarns cotton aran creates a 9x9 inch textured dishcloth **materials needed-** hook 4mm us size 6 0 yarn cotton aran aran weight 75-76 yards gauge 9 stitches by 5 row = 2 inches **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
